adminPortal.account.activation.required: Ili kuendelea, lazima uthibitishe anwani yako ya barua pepe ili kuamilisha akaunti yako ya {platform_name} . Tafadhali mara tu akaunti yako inapowezeshwa.
adminPortal.account.activation.support: Ukikumbana na masuala zaidi, tafadhali wasiliana na {support_name} kwa {support_link} .
